name: Pacman Revisited (indev)
description:
PACMAN REVISITED is inspired by the original game PACMAN but the developer of this game tried to add horror environment to this game.

NOTE:

**THIS GAME IS UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND NOT AN OFFICIAL RELEASE AND THAT IS WHY THIS VERSION IS CALLED INDEV. THE OFFICIAL RELEASE WILL BE AFTER THE MONTH OF  JULY.**

CONTROLS

W - MOVE FORWARD

S - MOVE BACKWARD

A - MOVE LEFT

D - MOVE RIGHT
